none: An emblem comprised of an eagle, two olive branches, and a variation of the United States of America's flag; military themed border.  Red and blue print.
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Front cover and page 2 both state that this song is: "dedicated to the boys from Camp Lewis, American Lake, Washington".
